ruleContent.content: var b64Match = src.match(/qTcms_S_m_murl_e="([^"]*)"/); var idMatch = src.match(/qTcms_m_url="\/manhua\/(\d+)\/"/); let options = { "headers": { 'User-Agent': "Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; Android 13; PFJM10 Build/TP1A.220905.001; wv) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Version/4.0 Chrome/132.0.6834.163 Mobile Safari/537.36", 'referer': "https://www.veryim.com/" } }; if (b64Match&&idMatch) { var b64 = java.base64Decode(b64Match[1]); var id = idMatch[1] var imgMatches = b64.match(/(https?:\/\/[^$]+)(\$qingtiandy\$|$)/g); if (imgMatches) { var imgArray = imgMatches.map(function(match) { return match.split('$qingtiandy$')[0]; }); var uniqueImgArray = Array.from(new Set(imgArray)); var data = JSON.stringify(uniqueImgArray); var html = uniqueImgArray.map(function(img) { return ''; }).join(''); html; } else { java.log("未找到图片链接"); } } else { java.log("未找到 Base64 编码的字符串"); }
